titleStmt.title: A briefe censure vpon the Puritane pamphlet entituled, (humble motyves, for association to maintayne religion established.) Reprooving of it so many vntruthes, as there be leaues in the same.
A briefe censure vpon the Puritane pamphlet entituled, (humble motyves, for association to maintayne religion established.) Reprooving of it so many vntruthes, as there be leaues in the same.

notesStmt.note: Anonymous response to: "Humble motives for association to maintaine religion established" (STC 3518), the first part of which is signed: T. Diggs.
Roman numeral date is misprinted on title page.
The words "humble .. established" on title page are enclosed within parentheses.
Place of publication and press from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
